channel.title: Automatic cfg update
channel.description:
hi
is it possible that when my server is on and i save something new in lets say item.cfg it automaticly updates my server if yes can somebody help me with that or write me a script or something
thanks
kevin

item.title: Automatic cfg update
item.dc:creator: @Mary_Jane Mary|Jane
item.description:
@Mary_Jane wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:2, topic:199445”]Lol if you wanna lag your computer like crazy there is… But no it’s not possible unless ub3r lag.

Make a program with a big ‘while’ statement. xD[/quote]

How would you edit + compile + run the server, while his server is already up? And if that was possible, which i doubt it is, what if he got a error? The server would just flat-out shut down?

Read full topic
